categories: Category:Contingency Orders for the Grand Army of the Republic

nodes.text: The 150 general orders were a set of orders memorized by every clone trooper of the entire Grand Army of the Galactic Republic. Along with the Republic's Supreme Chancellor, the Galactic Senate's Security Council was capable of activating any of the orders.

The 150 general orders were first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Rise of the Separatists, a 2019 supplement to Fantasy Flight Games' series of Star Wars Roleplaying products. The orders first appeared in the Star Wars Legends, where it was identified as the Contingency Orders for the Grand Army of the Republic: Order Initiation, Orders 1 Through 150 in the junior novelization of Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith, authored by Patricia C. Wrede and published in 2005.
